Affix.Name: Desert Pavilion Chronicle
Affix.Desc: When Charged Attacks hit opponents, the equipping character's Normal Attack SPD will increase by 10% while Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attack DMG will increase by 40% for 15s.

EQUIP_RING.Name: Defender of the Enchanting Dream
EQUIP_RING.Desc: An ancient golden cup that is both marvelously and luxuriously wrought. Murmurings can be heard within its empty innards.

EQUIP_NECKLACE.Name: End of the Golden Realm
EQUIP_NECKLACE.Desc: A crystal-clear artificial feather that is one of the legacies of an ancient human realm. The cries of soaring eagles are also sealed within.

EQUIP_DRESS.Name: Legacy of the Desert High-Born
EQUIP_DRESS.Desc: Earrings made from amber gold that shines with a strange light.

EQUIP_BRACER.Name: The First Days of the City of Kings
EQUIP_BRACER.Desc: An artificial flower that shimmers with a strange light. If you incline your ear to it, you can vaguely hear charming laughter issuing from within.

EQUIP_SHOES.Name: Timepiece of the Lost Path
EQUIP_SHOES.Desc: An ancient mechanical clock. The Jinni fragments continue to emit light at its center and vibrate ever so slightly, as if to say something...
